mapper.select: select id, general_university, general_company, general_work_date_begin, general_work_date_end, general_introduction from tbl_general where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_general (general_university, general_company, general_work_date_begin, general_work_date_end, general_introduction) values(#{generalUniversity}, #{generalCompany}, #{generalWorkDateBegin}, #{generalWorkDateEnd}, #{generalIntroduction})
